directions:
Combine everything except paprika

Either toss shrimp or lobster or serve on the side as a dipping sauce

Sprinkle with paprika for flavor and color

html.directions:
Combine everything except paprika

Either toss shrimp or lobster or serve on the side as a dipping sauce

Sprinkle with paprika for flavor and color
html.ingredients:
• ⅔ cup of fresh [[Mayonnaise]]
  • 1 tbsp ketchup
  • 1 tsp Worcestershire sauce
  • 1 tsp freshly grated horseradish or wasabi
  • Tabasco sauce
  • Pinch of paprika

ingredients:
⅔ cup of fresh [recipe:Mayonnaise]
1 tbsp ketchup
1 tsp Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp freshly grated horseradish or wasabi
Tabasco sauce
Pinch of paprika
name: Marie Rose Sauce
